duties_responsibilities.duty:
Fast paced and physical warehouse work 
- Loading, unloading, and sorting packages of various sizes.
- Part time employees work one shift a day; full time employees work two shifts.
- Shift lengths vary based on package volume; generally part time employees work between 3 and 6 hours a day, while full time employees work between 6 and 10 hours.
- Overtime paid after 40 hours a week.
